div.head: Description of changes for 2013.01
div.p: This is the first public version of this text. It is a first draft copied from a descriptive transcription of the St. Victor manuscript. A transcription of the Sorbonne manuscript still needs to be completed. A collation comparision of available manuscript witnesses will then follow and corrections and editions will be made. Unclear elements have been tagged and most name and title elements have been given a reference to their unique instance. Many cross-references have been added, other citations and a critical apparatus still await construction.
